name: Compressed Firefox User Profile Data File

description: Only the Firefox web browser utilizes MOZLZ4 files so you will most likely only encounter the file(s) if you use Firefox to browse the Internet. The files are primarily stored in the "Profile" folder where Firefox stores information about your web browser user profile. MOZLZ4 files are often found alongside .JSONLZ4 files, which also store user profile data, most often bookmarked websites.

The mozlz4 format is similar to the .LZ4 archive format but includes a unique file header. It typically stores one or more .JSON files that contain the user profile data in plain text JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) format.

common_filenames.description: search.json.mozlz4 - The name of a MOZLZ4 file that stores a list of default search engine options for the Firefox web browser.
